definition: disabled in the feet or legs, an interruption or temporary suspension of progress or movement, stop the flow of a liquid
details:
adjective
- disabled in the feet or legs
= synonyms: game
noun
- an interruption or temporary suspension of progress or movement
= example: an interruption or temporary suspension of progress or movement
= synonyms: freeze
- the event of something ending
= synonyms: stop
- the state of inactivity following an interruption
= synonyms: check
verb
- stop the flow of a liquid
= synonyms: stem
- cause to stop
= synonyms: arrest
- come to a halt, stop moving
= synonyms: stop
- stop from happening or developing
= synonyms: block
